html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11102024-10-11TC
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Security Regulations, 2012 (Air Cargo)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION SECURITY REGULATIONS, 2012 (AIR CARGO) in order to (1) require affected carriers to submit basic cargo information to Transport Canada for risk assessment before cargo is loaded on board an aircraft destined for Canada; (2) submit flight information as soon as feasible following a flight’s departure and before its arrival in Canada; (3) provide contact information for a principal point of contact; (4) designate the new requirements as enforceable via administrative monetary penalties of up to $25,000; and (5) use new IT system to conduct automated risk assessments of the cargo information submitted by carriers.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0203 Publication Date: 2024-10-23
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION SECURITY REGULATIONS, 2012 (AIR CARGO) in order to (1) require affected carriers to submit basic cargo information to Transport Canada for risk assessment before cargo is loaded on board an aircraft destined for Canada; (2) submit flight information as soon as feasible following a flight’s departure and before its arrival in Canada; (3) provide contact information for a principal point of contact; (4) designate the new requirements as enforceable via administrative monetary penalties of up to $25,000; and (5) use new IT system to conduct automated risk assessments of the cargo information submitted by carriers.
